steps.name: Flights
steps.description: Book round-trip business class flights to Narita (NRT) or Haneda (HND) from your origin city. Consider airlines like Japan Airlines (JAL) or ANA for premium service. Aim for a non-stop flight if available.

steps.name: Airport Transfers
steps.description: Arrange a private airport transfer to your hotel. Options include a limousine service, a pre-booked private car, or the Narita Express train to Tokyo Station followed by a taxi to your hotel.

steps.name: Accommodation
steps.description: Secure reservations at a luxury hotel in Tokyo. Recommendations include The Ritz-Carlton Tokyo (stunning views), Mandarin Oriental Tokyo (excellent dining), or Aman Tokyo (minimalist luxury).

steps.name: Day 1: Arrival & Ginza Exploration
steps.description: Check into your hotel and leave your luggage. Take a stroll through Ginza, known for its upscale boutiques and department stores. Enjoy a Michelin-starred sushi dinner at Sukiyabashi Jiro (if reservations are possible) or a similar high-end sushi restaurant.
steps.warning: Travel Advisory: Mandatory quarantine for 5 days for travelers from India to Japan. This step involves activities on Day 1 after arrival, violating the mandatory quarantine period.
steps.alternative: Alternative: Delay activities until after the mandatory 5-day quarantine period is complete. The first 5 days should be spent in mandatory quarantine.

steps.name: Day 2: Culture & Tradition
steps.description: Visit the Tsukiji Outer Market for a delicious seafood breakfast. Explore the Imperial Palace East Garden and the serene Meiji Jingu Shrine. In the afternoon, immerse yourself in the vibrant culture of the Harajuku district, known for its unique street style.
steps.warning: Travel Advisory: Mandatory quarantine for 5 days for travelers from India to Japan. This step involves activities on Day 2 after arrival, violating the mandatory quarantine period.
steps.alternative: Alternative: Delay activities until after the mandatory 5-day quarantine period is complete. The first 5 days should be spent in mandatory quarantine.

steps.name: Day 3: Modern Tokyo & Panoramic Views
steps.description: Ascend the Tokyo Skytree for panoramic views of the city. Explore the trendy Shibuya district, famous for its iconic scramble crossing. Enjoy a traditional Kaiseki dinner (multi-course Japanese haute cuisine).
steps.warning: Travel Advisory: Mandatory quarantine for 5 days for travelers from India to Japan. This step involves activities on Day 3 after arrival, violating the mandatory quarantine period.
steps.alternative: Alternative: Delay activities until after the mandatory 5-day quarantine period is complete. The first 5 days should be spent in mandatory quarantine.

steps.name: Day 4: Day Trip to Hakone
steps.description: Take a day trip to Hakone, a mountain resort town known for its stunning views of Mount Fuji, hot springs, and art museums. Enjoy a cruise on Lake Ashi and visit the Hakone Open-Air Museum.
steps.warning: Travel Advisory: Mandatory quarantine for 5 days for travelers from India to Japan. This step involves activities on Day 4 after arrival, violating the mandatory quarantine period.
steps.alternative: Alternative: Delay activities until after the mandatory 5-day quarantine period is complete. The first 5 days should be spent in mandatory quarantine.

steps.name: Day 5: Art & Relaxation
steps.description: Visit the Ghibli Museum (reservations required well in advance) for a whimsical journey into the world of Studio Ghibli animation. Enjoy a relaxing spa treatment at your hotel or a traditional Japanese onsen (hot spring bath).
steps.warning: Travel Advisory: Mandatory quarantine for 5 days for travelers from India to Japan. This step involves activities on Day 5 after arrival, violating the mandatory quarantine period.
steps.alternative: Alternative: Delay activities until after the mandatory 5-day quarantine period is complete. The first 5 days should be spent in mandatory quarantine.

steps.name: Day 6: Shopping & Entertainment
steps.description: Explore the Akihabara district, known for its electronics and anime culture. Indulge in some last-minute souvenir shopping and enjoy a farewell dinner at a themed restaurant or a traditional Izakaya (Japanese pub).
steps.warning: Day 6 involves exploring Akihabara and shopping. However, if the traveler arrived from India, a mandatory 5-day quarantine is in effect which could still be active depending on arrival time, and therefore this step could violate the quarantine requirement if arrival was only one day before.
steps.alternative: If arrival from India was less than 5 days prior to Day 6, all activities should be postponed until after the quarantine is completed. During quarantine, alternative activities that comply with the restrictions should be done, like watching movies or reading books.

steps.name: Day 7: Departure
steps.description: Enjoy a final Japanese breakfast. Arrange a private transfer back to Narita (NRT) or Haneda (HND) for your departure flight.
steps.warning: The itinerary includes activities from Day 7 onwards, violating the mandatory 5-day quarantine for travelers from India to Japan, assuming travel starts on day 1. This day involves a final Japanese breakfast and departure.
steps.alternative: All activities scheduled for Day 7 should be postponed until after the mandatory quarantine period is over. These activities can be rescheduled for Day 12 onwards, after the quarantine completion.  The departure should be scheduled for day 12, at the earliest.

steps.name: Visa & Travel Insurance
steps.description: Check visa requirements for Japan based on your nationality. Purchase comprehensive travel insurance that covers medical emergencies, trip cancellations, and lost luggage.
